channel.title: Lex- Yahoo [Rave]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/lextunes/lex-yahoo
I’m feeling a bit better, so I did a thing. Honestly this is one of my favorite types of music to make, it’s a lot of fun!
Sorry if the mixing is a little wonky. I’m not the best at it lol
Anyways, any feedback is appreciated!
If you wanna remix this, private message me and I’ll send you the stems.

item.description:
Awesome, gonna grab them later. I’m maybe winding down on drum and bass for a bit but will still be nice to have these already prepped. Without a computer it’s not exactly fun to chop up samples, a lot of app juggling

item.title: Lex- Yahoo [Rave]
item.dc:creator: Lex
item.description:
It isn’t in the sound library, I got the amen break bits from this mediafire link I found on reddit. I can PM you if you want it.

But I’m assuming you do so I’ll just go ahead and PM it to ya lol

Glad both of you like it hehe

Or ya know what here’sthe link since for some reason I can’t PM anyone yet http://www.mediafire.com/file/znx8t804frme7c3/

Read full topic

WHAT SNARE SAMPLE

I’ll be honest I am so busy and kind of lazy I have yet to properly cut up an amen break but if this is in the sound library I need to know.

BTW my 18 month old is dancing to this Lolol. I like it too lol
